message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this excellent product. I think it would be perfect for your needs.  Given its quality and features, I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $20,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $17,000.  I believe this price reflects a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $17,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $13,000. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
